meanings.sent1: The little mouse made the gutsiest decision to stand up to the big cat.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the gutsiest firefighter in the station for her bravery during emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The gutsiest squirrel in the forest challenged the biggest acorn hoarder to a nut-gathering contest.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to speak up against injustice was the gutsiest move she had ever made.
meanings.sent5: The gutsiest knight in the kingdom fearlessly faced the fire-breathing dragon.

meanings.definition: Having the most courage or determination among a group
meanings.sent1: Among all the students, she was the gutsiest when it came to solving difficult math problems.
meanings.sent2: He proved to be the gutsiest of the team by leading them through the treacherous mountain terrain.
meanings.sent3: The gutsiest of the siblings, she always took charge during family adventures.
meanings.sent4: In the competition, she showed she was the gutsiest by taking on challenges others avoided.
meanings.sent5: The gutsiest explorer in the group fearlessly ventured into the uncharted jungle.
